page.title: 15CURRIE FOOTBALL
page.content: Last year the first thing the primary 6 football team won was the Sinclair Trophy. It was a seven-a-side competition. Next was the Dominion Cup which we won 2-1 against Dean Park School in Balerno.Then came the Carson Cup where we again beat Dean Park 5-0 in the final. We then went on to win the league. Our greatest triumph was against Davidson's Mains in the semi-final of the School Board Cup. It was a 3-3 draw at full time and we scored the winning goal in extra time. That took us into the final of the School Board Cup when we played against Craigentinny School and won 3-2, winning the cup for Juniper Green for the second year running.
